title: Kingston Hospital Blue Book
description:
**Guidelines for Kingston Hospital NHS Trust are now on mobile!** 

This includes the blue book, ideal body weight/ creat clearance calculator and constantly updating covid - 19 guidance.

All queries should be directed to the following email address, your feedback is much appreciated: kingstonbluebook@gmail.com

DISCLAIMER

The Blue Book is provision of guidance only and does not take the place of clinical acumen. 

This application seeks to replicate the guidance contained in Kingston NHS Trusts BLUE BOOK. The BLUE BOOK is guidance only and practitioners should approach each patient individually and having regard for that individual’s personal circumstances. The creators of this application cannot guarantee that the application represents a completely accurate transposition of the BLUE BOOK and they themselves do not have responsibility for the content of the BLUE BOOK. 

If in any doubt, please consult your clinical senior or an appropriate specialist


The Blue Book App is brought to you by Dr Eleanor Cartwright, Dr Aaron Morjaria and Dr Ram Kumar.

recentChanges:
New update - bringing in line with iOS version 

1. Covid guidelines moved to infectious diseases/ ITU sections.
2. Creat clearance calculator bugs fixed
